member.summary: Internal only method for use in unit testing - provides a hook to the OnStop event trigger.

member.summary: Initialise the service ready for use - set thread entry points (etc)

member.summary: Main (loop) thread used to manage execution.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds which the main thread should sleep inbetween cycles. Defaults to 1000ms.

member.name: P:Codentia.Common.SingleThreadedServiceBase.MainThreadSleepSegment
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the segment (milliseconds) in which the main thread should execute its sleeps between cycles. This is used to allow more responsive behaviour when asked to stop. Defaults to 100ms.

member.name: T:Codentia.Common.SingleThreadedServiceBase.MainThreadEntryPoint
member.summary: Delegate used to pass a reference to the method which should be executed on each service cycle.
